scripts.build: rm -rf public_html public_html.zip && next build && cp index.html public_html/
scripts.build:zip: rm -rf public_html public_html.zip && npm run build && zip -r public_html.zip public_html/
scripts.build:lzip: rm -rf public_html public_html.zip && npm run build && zip -r public_html.zip public_html/ -x '*.mp4' -x '*.webm' -x '*.mov' -x '*.avi' -x '*.mkv' -x '*.png' -x '*.jpeg' -x '*.jpg' -x '*.webp'
